resources.string:
Καλώς ήρθατε στο AA AIO Tweaker
 Αυτή η εφαρμογή θα σας επιτρέψει να εφαρμόσετε κάποια tweaks στο Android Auto
 Απλά επιλέξτε τι tweak θέλετε να εφαρμόσετε :)
 Αν δεν είστε σίγουροι για το τι κάνει ένα tweak, με παρατεταμένο πάτημα σε αυτό θα εμφανιστεί η επεξήγηση.

This app can alter Android Auto behaviour and bypass some safety features that Google has implemented in Android Auto.\n By using this software, you agree that YOU, and ONLY YOU, are solely responsible for any possible consequence that may result in altering safety features such as injury to yourself and/or others, property damage, loss of life.\n Under no circumstances is the author of this app responsible for its use

Status Legend:
 GREEN= Patch applied
 YELLOW= Reboot is needed to apply patch
 RED= Patch is not applied

This tweak will make Android Auto think that the car is at 0 speed. As a result, Android Auto will always show the preview of messages. This tweak does not apply to keyboard or first configuration of Android Auto.
This tweak will override the 6 tap limit of Android Auto and will make unlimited browsing of content always possible.

This tweak will unlock the new Assistant Shortcuts feature. Once activated you can go in Android Auto settings, and in the customize launcher section you can start adding shortcuts to Google Assistant commands

This tweak will override the default behaviour of Android Auto opening a navigation app at start and will make Android Auto start on launcher.\n In some cases this tweak will disable auto start of music. A known workaround is to disable and re-enable the option within Android Auto settings.\n IT\'S NOT POSSIBLE TO SET A SPECIFIC APP TO START FIRST.
This tweak will force Android Auto in widescreen mode.
This tweak will force Android Auto in no widescreen mode.
This tweak enable an animation of Google Assistant in the navigation bar.
This tweak will make the status bar always black.
This tweak will prevent the battery icon with the red outline when battery saver is on.
This tweak let you set a custom duration for heads up notifications
This tweak let you set a custom duration for media notifications in navigation bar to up to 15 minutes.
This tweak should prevent Bluetooth from turning on when Android Auto is connected. This tweak won\'t work if Bluetooth is already on.

This tweak will enable third-party apps made specifically with Android Auto custom SDK to work on Android Auto.\n If you are familiar with AA Phenotype Patcher, this tweak is pretty much identical to it.\n It\'s not possible to add just any app to Android Auto, but it\'s possible to patch sideloaded apps MADE FOR ANDROID AUTO to work in cars.

This is an hidden feature inside Android Auto that will turn the second space in widescreen mode to a real second display that is completely taken by a seond activity. Google Maps will display a full map with navigation status, music and phones will take the full space.
 Additionally, this mode activates another feature that will turn the phone's screen in a second display for navigation in Android Auto.
 Settings for tweaking this feature will be available in Android Auto homescreen.
 Apparently, only Google Maps currently supports this mode.
 This feature is probably under development and could potentially not work as intended.
 Android Auto 5.8 or superior is required.
This tweak will prevent Android Auto from giving popup warnings when battery saver mode is on
Εξαναγκασμός ευρείας οθόνης έχει απενεργοποιηθεί αυτόματα
Η αναγκαστική απενεργοποίηση της ευρείας οθόνης έχει απενεργοποιηθεί αυτόματα

AA AIO TWEAKER is developed and maintained by Shmykelsa.

Source code is available on GitHub

If you really like my work, please consider a donation.
You can donate me through PayPal or you can copy my Bitcoin address with the button down below.

Even a small amount will be much appreciated :)

This tweak will activate the new built in wallpaper changer in Android Auto. Android Auto 5.8 or superior is required.\nWARNING: If you are a user of Wallpapers For Android Auto, you will need to update it to at least version 3.0, otherwise this tweak will break Wallpapers For Android Auto functionality.

Starting from December 2020, Google reverted a behaviour that happened since Android 10. Previously, the light/dark mode on Android Auto followed the light/dark mode on the phone and vice versa. This meant that switching the phone to dark mode had effect on the car, or if the phone was in dark mode and the car had lights off it used to switch on the light theme on the phone.\n However, since this feature of \"independent\" dark mode was introduced, users with Aftermarket headunits have no way to switch to dark mode anymore without actually wiring the stereo to the car\'s lights.\n This tweak makes sure that night mode is again dependent from phone and switching light/dark mode on phone will have its effects on cars too.

It\'s no mistery that Google logs a lot of datas about us. This tweak will make so that Google Play Services will stop a lot of tracking and logging activity.\n WARNING: This tweak has not been extensively tested and could potentially break Android Auto. If you find out that this tweak breaks Android Auto, please open an issue on GitHub.
Root access denied. Please allow root access.
Do you want to revert everything? Please manually restart the app after doing so

Αυτό το tweak θα προσαρμόσει την εφαρμογή ημερολογίου στο Android Auto να μπορεί να δείξει περισσότερες απο μια ημέρες. Παρακαλείστε να σημειώσετε ότι ακόμη και η αύξηση του αριθμού των ημερών, εξακολουθεί να μην είναι δυνατόν να διακρίνει απο ποια μέρα βλέπετε τα γεγονότα. Το Android Auto θα δείξει ακριβώς πόσα γεγονότα είναι ρυθμισμένα σε μια μέρα και δεν θα δείξει ποια μέρα είναι.
Το Android Auto δεν είναι ενεργοποιημένο
Το Android Auto δεν είναι εγκατεστημένο

"Αυτό το tweak θα κάνει μερικές εφαρμογές μηνυμάτων να εμφανίζονται ως εικονίδιο στο Android Auto. Μόλις ανοίξει, θα εμφανίζονται οι ειδοποιήσεις της εφαρμογής. Οι ειδοποιήσεις θα εξακολουθούν να λαμβάνονται και στο κέντρο ειδοποιήσεων. "

Το AA AIO TWEAKER δεν μπόρεσε να βρει κανένα λογαριασμό στη βάση δεδομένων Google Play Services. Αυτό μπορεί να προκληθεί γι απολλούς λόγους, όπως:
 • Συσκευή που συνήθως δεν είναι συνδεδεμένη στο διαδίκτυο
 • Νέα εγκατάσταση τηλεφώνου
 • Κατεστραμμένη βάση δεδομένων Google Play Services
 • Αφαίρεση λογαριασμού(ών) Google από το τηλέφωνο
 • Καθαρισμένα δεδομένα των Υπηρεσιών Google

Σε αυτό το σενάριο, το AA AIO TWEAKER θα ΑΠΟΤΥΧΕΙ να λειτουργήσει σωστά. Εάν αφαιρέσατε πρόσφατα έναν λογαριασμό Google ή εκκαθαρίσατε δεδομένα Google Play Services, κρατήστε το τηλέφωνο συνδεδεμένο στο διαδίκτυο και αφήστε το να δημιουργήσει πλήρως τη βάση δεδομένων Google Play Services. Αυτό μπορεί να διαρκέσει αρκετές ώρες, σε ορισμένες περιπτώσεις και ημέρες.

Εάν δεν είστε σε μία από τις παραπάνω προϋποθέσεις, παρακαλώ ανοίξτε ένα θέμα στο GitHub.
"Αυτό το tweak θα ενεργοποιήσει ένα νέο UI για εφαρμογές αναπαραγωγής πολυμέσων. Δεν υποστηρίζουν όλες οι εφαρμογές αυτό το UI. Απαιτείται Android Auto 5.8 ή ανώτερο. "

This tweak will increase or decrease video bitrate according to the multiplier set (up to 2.0x). Increasing the bitrate (more than 1.0x) will mean that more datas will be streamed to the car and quality of video streaming could be improved in visual quality, however it might cause instability. Decreasing the bitrate (less than 1.0x) will compress the stream to the car and quality will be decreased, but it will result in a more reliable and fast connection.
The command was not successful. Please wait some minutes and try again. If problem is still ongoing, please open a issue on GitHub

This tweak will activate a new (and hidden) redesign that changes how lists can be browsed with letters. Instead of the A-Z button at the top, the button will appear on the scrollbar when there\'s no scroll happening and you won\'t be forced to go to top to browse with letters again.
